Motion by Senator(s) Hooker to substitute an amendment for that of the Committee on Economic Development, Housing and General Affairs agreed to
Recommendation of amendment, as amended agreed to
3rd reading ordered on roll call, requested by Senator Sirotkin, Passed -- Needed 14 of 28 to Pass -- Yeas = 28, Nays = 0
New Business/Third Reading
Read 3rd time & passed
Rules suspended & messaged to House forthwith, on motion of Senator Ashe
Read First Time and Referred to the Committee on General, Housing, and Military Affairs
Read Second Time

Report of Committee on General, Housing, and Military Affairs agreed to.
Amendment as offered by Rep. Walz of Barre City agreed to
Third Reading Ordered
Read Third time and Passed in Concurrence with Proposal of Amendment
House message House passed bill in concurrence with proposal(s) of amendment
Entered on Notice Calendar
House Proposal of Amendment
Rules suspended & taken up for immediate consideration, on motion of Senator Ashe
House proposal of amendment; text
House proposal of amendment concurred in
As passed by Senate and House
Rules suspended & ordered delivered to Governor forthwith, on motion of Senator Ashe
Senate Message, House proposal of amendment concurred in
Delivered to Governor on October 6, 2020
Signed by Governor on October 12, 2020
